summary: Full-stack testing completed successfully. Backend APIs 100% pass rate (14/14 tests). Frontend mobile UI tested - all critical flows working including login, navigation, categories, topics with YouTube videos, search, and auth-gated features.

frontend_test_summary.login_screen: ✓ Renders with Google login button and Skip button
frontend_test_summary.home_screen: ✓ Shows all 5 categories (First Aid, Finance, Crisis Management, Civic Sense, Safety Tips) with images and topic counts
frontend_test_summary.category_navigation: ✓ Category cards navigate to category detail page with topics list
frontend_test_summary.topic_detail: ✓ Topic detail page shows content and YouTube videos (5 videos for CPR topic)
frontend_test_summary.search: ✓ Search functionality working - returns relevant results for 'cpr' query
frontend_test_summary.tab_navigation: ✓ All tabs working (Home, Search, Saved, Profile)
frontend_test_summary.auth_gated_bookmarks: ✓ Bookmarks require login - shows 'Sign in to save topics' prompt for guests
frontend_test_summary.profile_guest_mode: ✓ Profile screen shows 'Guest Mode' when not logged in
frontend_test_summary.youtube_integration: ✓ YouTube API working - videos loading on topic detail pages

screenshots: 01_login_screen.png - Login screen with Google login and Skip button
03_category_page.png - First Aid category with topics list
04_topic_detail.png - CPR topic with content and YouTube videos
06_bookmarks_guest.png - Bookmarks auth prompt for guest users
seed_data_creation: No additional seed data created. App uses existing MongoDB seed data (5 categories, 22 topics)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Backend APIs tested with pytest. Frontend tested with Playwright on mobile viewport (390x844). YouTube API integration working. Auth-gated features correctly blocking unauthenticated users. No issues found.

testing_notes.youtube_api: YouTube API is working and returning 5 videos for CPR topic. API key is valid and quota available.
testing_notes.auth_testing: Auth-gated endpoints (bookmarks, /api/auth/me) correctly return 401 for unauthenticated requests. Frontend shows appropriate auth prompts.
testing_notes.mobile_first: App tested on mobile viewport (390x844) - all UI elements properly sized and responsive
testing_notes.navigation: All navigation flows tested - login->home, category->topic, tab switching all working smoothly
testing_notes.data_integrity: MongoDB has 5 categories and 22 topics as expected. All categories have topics. Search returns valid results.
